name: Hidden Object - Endangered Wildlife
description:
Help save the Endangered Wildlife by finding hidden objects polluting 10 of their otherwise beautiful environments!

Our latest FREE hidden object game features 10 stunning scenes, with images in beautiful HD and a pinch to zoom function included.

Features:
10 Stages of endangered wildlife for you to save!
3 Difficulty modes: Casual, Normal, Challenge
4 Game Modes: Silhouette, Words, Picture, Random
Training mode for beginners
Extra "Hard" hiding mode where items are partially blended into the background
Pinch to zoom

What can you do for the Endangered Wildlife?
